TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RegexCompilationInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有關規則運算式的資訊，用於將規則運算式編譯成獨立組件。

span.span: Provides information about a regular expression that is used to compile a regular expression to a stand-alone assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列物件傳遞至方法以提供要包含在組件中的每個規則運算式的相關資訊。An array of objects is passed to the method to provide information about each regular expression to be included in the assembly. 包含組件中每個已編譯規則運算式表示為類別衍生自。Each compiled regular expression that is included in the assembly is represented as a class derived from . 內容型別定義規則運算式的類別名稱、 其完整的名稱 （也就是它的命名空間和其型別名稱），其規則運算式模式 （例如，規則運算式是任何其他選項不區分大小寫），並指定規則運算式引擎應該搜尋比對的時間長度的逾時間隔。The properties of the type define the regular expression's class name, its fully qualified name (that is, its namespace and its type name), its regular expression pattern, any additional options (such as whether the regular expression is case-insensitive), and a time-out interval that specifies how long the regular expression engine should search for a match. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫其多載的類別建構函式的物件。You can instantiate a object by calling its overloaded class constructor.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The regular expression to compile.

param.span: 要在編譯規則運算式時使用的規則運算式選項。

span.span: The regular expression options to use when compiling the regular expression.

span.span: The name of the type that represents the compiled regular expression.

param.name: fullnamespace
param.span: 新型別所屬的命名空間。

span.span: The namespace to which the new type belongs.

param.span: 如果要使編譯過的規則運算式公開可見，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to make the compiled regular expression publicly visible; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其中包含有關要包含在組件中的規則運算式的資訊。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a regular expression to be included in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個參數的建構函式會直接對應到屬性的類別。Each parameter of the constructor directly corresponds to a property of the class. 因為所有屬性都是讀取/寫入，也可以直接指派其值。Because all properties are read/write, their values can also be assigned directly. 方法會產生內含編譯的規則運算式的組件。The method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. 因此，您不應該指定做為其中一個值`options`。Therefore, you should not specify as one of the values of `options`. 如果`ispublic`是`true`，編譯的規則運算式類別會提供公用存取範圍。If `ispublic` is `true`, the compiled regular expression class is given public accessibility. 也就是說，它可以具現化從任何組件中執行的程式碼。That is, it can be instantiated from code that executes in any assembly. 如果`ispublic`是`false`，編譯的規則運算式類別有`internal`（C# 中） 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 存取範圍。If `ispublic` is `false`, the compiled regular expression class is given `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) accessibility. 也就是說，它可以具現化只能從會在規則運算式類別相同的組件中執行的程式碼。That is, it can be instantiated only from code that executes in the same assembly as the regular expression class. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並在兩個步驟中使用編譯的規則運算式。The following example creates and uses a compiled regular expression in two steps. 在第一個步驟中，編譯並執行下列程式碼範例。In the first step, compile and execute the following code example. 建構函式程式碼範例中的定義的已編譯的規則運算式。The constructor in the code example defines a compiled regular expression. 執行程式碼的結果是名為 FishRegex.dll 包含名為編譯的規則運算式類型的組件`FishRegex`。The result of executing the code is an assembly named FishRegex.dll that contains a compiled regular expression type named `FishRegex`. [!code-csharp[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/cs/genFishRegex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/vb/genFishRegex.vb#1)] 在第二個步驟中，請編譯下列程式碼範例使用 FishRegex.dll 的參考，然後再執行 產生的可執行檔。In the second step, compile the following code example using a reference to FishRegex.dll, and then run the resulting executable file. 可執行檔使用符合目標字串`FishRegex`類型，而目標字串中顯示相符項目、 群組、 擷取的群組和之相符項目的索引位置。The executable file matches a target string by using the `FishRegex` type, and displays the match, group, capture group, and index position of the matches in the target string. [!code-csharp[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/cs/useFishRegex.cs#2)] [!code-vb[sys.txt.rgxCompInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.txt.rgxCompInfo/vb/useFishRegex.vb#2)]

para.span: 這個建構函式會建立編譯的規則運算式會使用預設的逾時值，在其中建立的應用程式定義域。

span.span: This constructor creates a compiled regular expression that uses the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is created.

para.span: 如果應用程式定義域定義逾時值，編譯的規則運算式會使用值，這樣就不會逾時的模式比對作業。建立的已編譯的規則運算式的建議建構函式是，可讓您設定的逾時間隔。

span.span: If a time-out value is defined for the application domain, the compiled regular expression uses the value , which prevents a pattern-matching operation from timing out. The recommended constructor for creating a compiled regular expression is , which lets you set the time-out interval.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體包含要在組件中加入指定逾時值之規則運算式的相關資訊。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains information about a regular expression with a specified time-out value to be included in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個參數的建構函式會直接對應到屬性的類別。Each parameter of the constructor directly corresponds to a property of the class. 因為所有屬性都是讀取/寫入，也可以直接指派其值。Because all properties are read/write, their values can also be assigned directly. 方法會產生內含編譯的規則運算式的組件。The method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. 因此，您不應該指定做為其中一個值`options`。Therefore, you should not specify as one of the values of `options`. 如果`ispublic`是`true`，編譯的規則運算式類別會提供公用存取範圍。If `ispublic` is `true`, the compiled regular expression class is given public accessibility. 也就是說，它可以具現化從任何組件中執行的程式碼。That is, it can be instantiated from code that executes in any assembly. 如果`ispublic`是`false`，編譯的規則運算式類別有`internal`（C# 中） 或`Friend`（在 Visual Basic) 存取範圍。If `ispublic` is `false`, the compiled regular expression class is given `internal` (in C#) or `Friend` (in Visual Basic) accessibility. 也就是說，它可以具現化只能從會在規則運算式類別相同的組件中執行的程式碼。That is, it can be instantiated only from code that executes in the same assembly as the regular expression class. `matchTimeout`參數會定義編譯的規則運算式的預設逾時間隔。The `matchTimeout` parameter defines the default time-out interval for the compiled regular expression. 這個值代表已編譯的規則運算式物件會執行單一比對作業，作業逾時和規則運算式引擎會擲回之前的時間的大約數量其下一個計時檢查期間的例外狀況.This value represents the approximate amount of time that a compiled regular expression object will execute a single matching operation before the operation times out and the regular expression engine throws a exception during its next timing check. 其他的逾時值的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For additional information about the time-out value, see the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們建議您一律設定編譯的規則運算式的預設逾時值。We recommend that you always set a default time-out value for a compiled regular expression. 您的規則運算式程式庫的取用者可以傳遞覆寫該逾時值值，代表這個建構函式多載的新的逾時間隔。Consumers of your regular expression library can override that time-out value by passing a value that represents the new time-out interval to this constructor overload. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為單一編譯規則運算式`DuplicateChars`識別兩個或多個輸入字串中的相同字元。The following example defines a single compiled regular expression named `DuplicateChars` that identifies two or more occurrences of the same character in an input string. 已編譯的規則運算式有 2 秒的預設逾時。The compiled regular expression has a default time-out of 2 seconds. 當您執行範例時，它會建立名為 RegexLib.dll，其中包含已編譯的規則運算式的類別庫。When you execute the example, it creates a class library named RegexLib.dll that contains the compiled regular expression. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1.vb#1)] 規則運算式模式 `(\w)\1+` 的定義如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1+` is defined as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w)`|比對任何文字字元，並將它指派給第一個擷取群組。Match any word character and assign it to the first capturing group.| |`\1+`|比對一個或多個值的第一個擷取群組。Match one or more occurrences of the value of the first captured group.| 下列範例會使用`DuplicatedChars`來識別重複的字元字串陣列中的規則運算式。The following example uses the `DuplicatedChars` regular expression to identify duplicate characters in a string array. 當呼叫`DuplicatedChars`建構函式，會變更為.5 秒的逾時間隔。When it calls the `DuplicatedChars` constructor, it changes the time-out interval to .5 seconds. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1a.vb#2)]

span.span: is negative, zero, or greater than approximately 24 days.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPublic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出已編譯的規則運算式是否具有公用可視性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the compiled regular expression has public visibility.

value.span: 如果規則運算式具有公用可視性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the regular expression has public visibility; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`，目前的執行個體所定義的規則運算式類別可以具現化只能由執行包含的類別的組件中的程式碼。If the property is `false`, the regular expression class defined by the current instance can be instantiated only by code that is executing in the assembly that contains the class. 不過，因為方法會產生包含已編譯的規則運算式，且不允許額外的程式碼可加入的組件，通常是以指派此屬性的值沒有理由`false`。However, because the method generates an assembly that contains only compiled regular expressions and does not allow additional code to be added, there is generally no reason to assign this property a value of `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan MatchTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定規則運算式的預設逾時間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the regular expression's default time-out interval.

value.span: 在擲回之前，可在模式比對作業中流逝的預設最大時間間隔，或者為（如果停用逾時）。

span.span: The default maximum time interval that can elapse in a pattern-matching operation before a is thrown, or if time-outs are disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會定義編譯的規則運算式的預設逾時間隔。The property defines the default time-out interval for the compiled regular expression. 這個值代表已編譯的規則運算式會執行單一比對作業，作業逾時和規則運算式引擎會擲回之前的時間的大約數量其下一個計時檢查期間的例外狀況。This value represents the approximate amount of time that a compiled regular expression will execute a single matching operation before the operation times out and the regular expression engine throws a exception during its next timing check. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們建議您一律設定編譯的規則運算式的預設逾時值。We recommend that you always set a default time-out value for a compiled regular expression. 您的規則運算式程式庫的取用者可以傳遞覆寫該逾時值值，表示新的逾時間隔已編譯的規則運算式的類別建構函式。Consumers of your regular expression library can override that time-out value by passing a value that represents the new time-out interval to the compiled regular expression's class constructor. 您可以指派到預設的逾時值物件中任何以下列方式：You can assign a default time-out value to a object in any of the following ways: - 藉由呼叫方法並提供的字串表示"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"屬性的值。By calling the method and providing the string representation of a value for the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property. - 藉由呼叫建構函式，並提供值`matchTimeout`參數。By calling the constructor and providing a value for the `matchTimeout` parameter. - 藉由設定這個屬性的值。By setting the value of this property. 若要設定的合理的逾時間隔，請考慮下列因素：To set a reasonable time-out interval, consider the following factors: - 長度與複雜度的規則運算式模式。The length and complexity of the regular expression pattern. 長、 更複雜的規則運算式會需要更多的時間比短且更簡單。Longer and more complex regular expressions require more time than shorter and simpler ones. - 預期的機器工作負載。The expected machine load. 在 CPU 和記憶體使用率過高的系統上處理花費的時間。Processing takes more time on systems with high CPU and memory utilization. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為單一編譯規則運算式`DuplicateChars`識別兩個或多個輸入字串中的相同字元。The following example defines a single compiled regular expression named `DuplicateChars` that identifies two or more occurrences of the same character in an input string. 已編譯的規則運算式有 2 秒的預設逾時。The compiled regular expression has a default time-out of 2 seconds. 當您執行範例時，它會建立名為 RegexLib.dll，其中包含已編譯的規則運算式的類別庫。When you execute the example, it creates a class library named RegexLib.dll that contains the compiled regular expression. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1.vb#1)] 規則運算式模式 `(\w)\1+` 的定義如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `(\w)\1+` is defined as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w)`|比對任何文字字元，並將它指派給第一個擷取群組。Match any word character and assign it to the first capturing group.| |`\1+`|比對一個或多個值的第一個擷取群組。Match one or more occurrences of the value of the first captured group.| 下列範例會使用`DuplicatedChars`來識別重複的字元字串陣列中的規則運算式。The following example uses the `DuplicatedChars` regular expression to identify duplicate characters in a string array. 當呼叫`DuplicatedChars`建構函式，會變更為.5 秒的逾時間隔。When it calls the `DuplicatedChars` constructor, it changes the time-out interval to .5 seconds. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/cs/example1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexCompilationInfo.MatchTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regexcompilationinfo.matchtimeout/vb/example1a.vb#2)]

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生內含編譯的規則運算式的組件。The method generates an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. 因此，您就不需要指定做為其中一個值，這個屬性。Therefore, you do not have to specify as one of the values of this property. 如果有的話，選項會被忽略。If it is present, the option is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Pattern { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

The regular expression to compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以包含任何有效的規則運算式。The property can contain any valid regular expression. 如果值屬性不是語法正確的規則運算式模式中，呼叫方法會擲回。If the value of the property is not a syntactically correct regular expression pattern, the call to the method throws an .

span.span: The value for this property is .
